title: Google\Cloud\Core\Batch\QueueOverflowException
name: QueueOverflowException
description:
Exception thrown in Google\Cloud\Core\Batch\SysvProcessor::submit() method when it cannot add an item to the message queue.

Possible causes include:

  • batch daemon is not running
  • no job registered for this queue
  • items are submitted faster than a job can handle them

Extends RuntimeException
